Method Detail

setViewport

public void setViewport(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 viewportPosition,
                        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 viewportDimensions)
Sets the viewport the Game happens in. Used as an optimization to not run the game in areas that is not within (wholly or partially), or near, the viewport.

Specified by:
setViewport in interface ModelEnvironment
Parameters:
viewportPosition - the center-position i world coordinates for the viewport.
viewportDimensions - the dimensions of the viewport in world coordinates (width, height).

update

public void update(float deltaTime)
Updates the models (the simulation is time-step based). This should be called once every frame.

Specified by:
update in interface ModelEnvironment
Parameters:
deltaTime - the time in seconds since last call.

dispose

public void dispose()
Frees up the object's assets/heavy-weight memory resources. To be run when the object is no longer needed.

Specified by:
dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

public int getRemovedSegmentCount()

Specified by:
getRemovedSegmentCount in interface ModelEnvironment
Returns:
